mapper.select: select count(*) from member where m_id = #{id}
select count(*) from member where m_nickname = #{nickname}
mapper.insert: insert into member (M_ID, M_PW, M_NAME, M_NICKNAME, M_EMAIL, M_GENDER, M_BIRTHDAY, ADMIN, LOGIN_OK) values(#{m_id}, #{m_pw}, #{m_name}, #{m_nickname}, #{m_email},#{m_gender}, #{m_birthday}, default, default)
